department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and Buyandsell posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted on 12-September-2023 by 14:00 EDT. All bids submitted after 14:00 EDT will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.
description: The Department of National Defence, CFB Kingston, Ontario has a requirement for the supply of all labour, materials and equipment required to provide snow removal and spreading of sodium chloride and treated abrasives for 3 locations within the city of Kingston, Ontario for a period from the date of award – 15 April 2026 with two additional one year option years.
duration_in_months: 42 Natural months from October 2023 to August 2026
tags: W6837-224749 Snow and Ice Control (SNIC) - CFB Kingston
